Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Scarab
Description: Small scarab made from enamel or a stone covered with enamel. Stylised prothorax and elytra, rounded back. The flat surface is inscribed with a central Ankh sign ("life") flanked by two other signs, the ensemble surrounded by a border.
